description: Cluster GET single baseline - before optimizations

comparison.notes: dotnet result from REST benchmark (autocannon), haskell from direct bench mode

top_cost_centers.name: createMultiplexer
top_cost_centers.analysis: Writer/reader loop startup and MVar operations dominate - likely the writerLoop/readerLoop forks and their steady-state blocking

top_cost_centers.name: submitToNodeAsync
top_cost_centers.analysis: Node routing and slot submission overhead - includes IORef read, round-robin, and enqueue

top_cost_centers.name: throwSocketErrorWaitWrite
top_cost_centers.analysis: Socket write syscall overhead - network I/O cost

top_cost_centers.name: submitCommandPooled
top_cost_centers.analysis: Per-command slot acquisition and MVar wait

top_cost_centers.name: crc16
top_cost_centers.analysis: CRC16 slot hash calculation - FFI overhead from ByteString marshalling
